TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RawStylusInput extends System.Object

Docs.summary: 提供有关从 到 的输入的信息。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput>以获取有关输入的信息<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn>接收当用户将触笔。
## Examples 下面的示例创建<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn>，用于检查<xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.Down>笔势。 <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn>调用<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.NotifyWhenProcessed%2A>中<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusUp%2A>璹綷<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusUpProcessed%2A>方法，从应用程序线程调用。
[!code-csharp[StylusPluginSamples#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusPluginSamples/CSharp/RecognizerPlugin.cs#12)] [!code-vb[StylusPluginSamples#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusPluginSamples/VisualBasic/RecognizerPlugin.vb#12)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection GetStylusPoints() cil managed

Docs.summary: 获取从触笔收集到的触笔接触点。
Docs.returns: 从触笔收集到的触笔接触点。

remarks.format:
## Examples 下面的示例演示如何更改中的触笔点<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusDown%2A>方法。 若要创建<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn>墨迹限制到特定区域，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn>概述。
[!code-csharp[StylusPluginSamples#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusPluginSamples/CSharp/FilterPlugin.cs#8)] [!code-vb[StylusPluginSamples#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusPluginSamples/VisualBasic/FilterPlugin.vb#8)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void NotifyWhenProcessed(object callbackData) cil managed

Docs.param: 要传递到应用程序线程的数据。
Docs.summary: 订阅应用程序线程的相应触笔方法。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 笔输入路由到元素的<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn>笔线程上。 由于无法对笔线程执行准确的命中测试，某些元素偶尔可能会收到适用于其他元素的触笔输入。 如果你需要以确保正确路由输入，正在执行的操作之前，请调用<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.NotifyWhenProcessed%2A>的方法中，在钢笔线程上发生的方法。 下表列出了在何处拜访<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.NotifyWhenProcessed%2A>订阅应用程序线程的方法。
|调用<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.NotifyWhenProcessed%2A>在此方法|璹綷此方法| |-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|---------------------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusDown%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusDownProcessed%2A>| |<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusMove%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusMoveProcessed%2A>| |<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusUp%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusUpProcessed%2A>|
## Examples 下面的示例创建<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn>，用于检查<xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.Down>笔势。 <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn>调用<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.NotifyWhenProcessed%2A>中<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusUp%2A>璹綷<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusUpProcessed%2A>方法，从应用程序线程调用。
[!code-csharp[StylusPluginSamples#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusPluginSamples/CSharp/RecognizerPlugin.cs#12)] [!code-vb[StylusPluginSamples#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusPluginSamples/VisualBasic/RecognizerPlugin.vb#12)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetStylusPoints(class System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection stylusPoints) cil managed

Docs.param: 要传递到应用程序线程的触笔接触点。
Docs.summary: 设置传递到应用程序线程的触笔接触点。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 如事件<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusDown>和<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusMove>，可以获取<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>设置<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.SetStylusPoints%2A>通过调用<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusEventArgs.GetStylusPoints%2A>方法。
## Examples 下面的示例演示如何更改中的触笔点<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusDown%2A>方法。 若要创建<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn>墨迹限制到特定区域，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn>概述。
[!code-csharp[StylusPluginSamples#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusPluginSamples/CSharp/FilterPlugin.cs#8)] [!code-vb[StylusPluginSamples#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusPluginSamples/VisualBasic/FilterPlugin.vb#8)]

Docs.permission: 用于设置触笔接触点。 关联的枚举：

public: property int StylusDeviceId { int get(); };

Docs.summary: 获取当前触笔设备的标识符。

remarks.format:
## Examples 以下示例将确保收集触笔接触点均来自同一<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice>。 此示例摘自中较大的示例<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput>类概述。
[!code-csharp[StylusPluginSamples#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusPluginSamples/CSharp/RecognizerPlugin.cs#15)] [!code-vb[StylusPluginSamples#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusPluginSamples/VisualBasic/RecognizerPlugin.vb#15)]

Docs.summary: 获取当前 Tablet 设备的标识符。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Timestamp As Integer
public: property int Timestamp { int get(); };

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.Timestamp%2A>属性是值的<xref:System.Environment.TickCount%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>发生触笔事件的属性。
